CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Links.​Link
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Links.​Link

A class encapsulating all the information available about a link.

Types
IgnoreFields
[Flags]
public enum IgnoreFields : ushort

When querying links from the database, not all fields may be needed in all circumstances.  This is a bitfield that allows you to specify which fields can be ignored.  This is also stored in the object so that, in debug builds, if you try to access any of these fields an exception will be thrown.

Functions
Link
public Link ()
SameIDPropertiesAs
public bool SameIDPropertiesAs (
Link other
)

Returns whether the identifying properties of the link (Type, TextOrSymbol, Context, FileID, ClassString, LanguageID) are the same as the passed one.

CompareIDPropertiesTo
public int CompareIDPropertiesTo (
Link other
)

Compares the identifying properties of the link (Type, TextOrSymbol, Context, FileID, LanguageID) and returns a value similar to a string comparison result which is suitable for sorting a list of Links.  It will return zero if all the properties are equal.

CopyNonIDPropertiesFrom
public void CopyNonIDPropertiesFrom (
Link other
)

Makes this link copy all the properties not tested by CompareIDPropertiesTo() and SameIDPropertiesAs() from the passed link.

Properties
LinkID
public int LinkID { get; set }

The link's ID number, or zero if it hasn't been set.

Type
public LinkType Type { get; set }

The links' type.

TextOrSymbol
public string TextOrSymbol { get; set }

If Type is LinkType.NaturalDocs, this will be the plain text of the link.  If it's any other LinkType, this will be the exported Symbols.SymbolString of the link text.  If the calling code knows exactly which type of link it is, it can use the Text or Symbol properties instead.

Text
public string Text { get; set }

If Type is LinkType.NaturalDocs, this will be the plain text of the link.  Throws an exception if you try to use this property for any other LinkType.

Symbol
public Symbols.SymbolString Symbol { get; set }

If Type is anything other than LinkType.NaturalDocs, this will be the Symbols.SymbolString of the link text.  Throws an exception if you try to use this property for LinkType.NaturalDocs.

Context
public Symbols.ContextString Context { get; set }

The context the link appears in.

ContextID
public int ContextID { get; set }

The ID of Context if known, or zero if not.  It will also be zero if Context is null.

ContextIDKnown
public bool ContextIDKnown { get }

Whether ContextID is known, which basically tests whether ContextID is zero when Context is not null.

FileID
public int FileID { get; set }

The ID number of the file that defines this link

ClassString
public Symbols.ClassString ClassString { get; set }

The class the link appears in.

ClassID
public int ClassID { get; set }

The ID of ClassString if known, or zero if not.  It will also be zero if ClassString is null.

ClassIDKnown
public bool ClassIDKnown { get }

Whether ClassID is known, which basically tests whether ClassID is zero when ClassString is not null.

LanguageID
public int LanguageID { get; set }

The ID number of the language of the topic that defines this link.

EndingSymbol
public Symbols.EndingSymbol EndingSymbol { get; set }

The ending symbol of the link.  If this is a Type or ClassParent link this is the only one needed, but if it's a Natural Docs link there may be more in <CodeDB.AlternateLinkEndingSymbols>.

IsResolved
public bool IsResolved { get }

Whether the link has a target topic.  Is equivalent to testing whether TargetTopicID is zero.

TargetTopicID
public int TargetTopicID { get; set }

The ID number of the <Topic> the link resolves to, or zero if none.

TargetClassID
public int TargetClassID { get; set }

The class ID number of the <Topic> the link resolves to, or zero if none.

TargetScore
public long TargetScore { get; set }

If this link is resolved, the numeric score of the match.

TargetInterpretationIndex
public int TargetInterpretationIndex { get }

If this link is resolved and it's a Natural Docs link, the index into its LinkInterpretations that was used.

IgnoredFields
public IgnoreFields IgnoredFields { get; set }

When querying links from the database, not all fields may be needed in all situations.  The database may accept IgnoreFields flags to skip retrieving parts of them.  If that's done, the flags should also be set here so that in debug builds an exception will be thrown if you try to access those properties.

IgnoredFields defaults to <IgnoreFields.None> so that links created by parsing don't have to worry about them.

Variables
linkID
protected int linkID

The links's ID number, or zero if not specified.

type
protected LinkType type

The LinkType.

textOrSymbol
protected string textOrSymbol

If type is LinkType.NaturalDocs, this will be the plain text of the link.  If it's any other LinkType it will be the exported Symbols.SymbolString of the link text.

context
protected Symbols.ContextString context

The context the link appears in.

contextID
protected int contextID

The ID of context if known, or zero if not.

fileID
protected int fileID

The ID number of the file that defines this link.

classString
protected Symbols.ClassString classString

The class this link appears in.

classID
protected int classID

The ID of classString if known, or zero if not.

languageID
protected int languageID

The ID number of the language of the topic that defines this link.

endingSymbol
protected Symbols.EndingSymbol endingSymbol

The EndingSymbol of the link.  If this is a Type or ClassParent link this is the only one needed, but if it's a Natural Docs link there may be more in <CodeDB.AlternateLinkEndingSymbols>.

targetTopicID
protected int targetTopicID

The ID number of the <Topic> the link resolves to, or zero if none.

targetClassID
protected int targetClassID

The class ID of the <Topic> the link resolves to, or zero if none.

targetScore
protected long targetScore

If targetTopicID is set, the numeric score of the match.

ignoredFields
protected IgnoreFields ignoredFields

The IgnoreFields applied to this object.
